hovertext:
Name of donor: Barbara Yerolemou
Address of donor: private
Amount of donation or nature and value if donation in kind: £2,000
Donor status: individual(Registered 07 July 2017)

Name of donor: Sun Mark Ltd
Address of donor: 428 Long Drive, Greenford UB6 8
UH
Amount of donation or nature and value if donation in kind: £2,000
Donor status: company, registration 03010238(Registered 07 July 2017)

Name of donor: Lazari Investments Ltd
Address of donor: 44 Baker Street, London W1
U 7
BR
Amount of donation, or nature and value if donation in kind: £2,500
Donor status: company, registration 1291023(Registered 08 September 2017)

Name of donor: Municipality of Morphou
Address of donor: 16 Zynonos Sozou, 1075 Nicosia, Cyprus
Estimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): Return flight, two nights accommodation and food with an estimated value of £1,260
Destination of visit: Cyprus
Dates of visit: 7-9 October 2016
Purpose of visit: To attend the annual Morphou Rally in Astromeritis.(Registered 20 October 2016)

Name of donor: (1) Conservative Friends of Israel (2) Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs
Address of donor: (1) PO Box 72288, London SW1
P 9
LB; (2) 9 Yitzhak Rabin Blvd., Kiryat Ben-Gurion, Jerusalem 9103001
Amount of donation (or estimate of the probable value): (1) Flight from Cyprus to Israel and flight from Israel to the UK, VIP airport service, accommodation and hospitality with an approximate value of £2,300 (2) bus travel to a value of £650
Destination of visit: Israel and the West Bank
Date of visit: 12-17 February 2017
Purpose of visit: To meet political leaders, commentators, business figures and others to discuss the prospects for a negotiated settlement between Israel and the Palestinians. (Registered 01 March 2017)

Nam of donor: Cyprus House of Representatives
Address of donor(s): House of Representatives, Nicosia, Cyprus
Estimate of probable value, or amount of any donation: Accommodation, taxi travel and hospitality, valued at approximately £740
Destination of visit: Cyprus
Date(s) of visit: 9 to 12 February 2017
Purpose of visit: To meet the President of Cyprus and other political figures; to receive an update on progress in the negotiations underway to reunite Cyprus.(Registered 01 March 2017)

Name of donor: British Tamils Forum
Address of donor: Tamil House, Unit 1, Fountayne Business Centre, Broad Lane, London N15 4
AG
Estimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation):Flights and hotel accommodation £500.45; estimated costs of lunch and taxis in Geneva £50; taxis to and from Heathrow £92.71; total £643.16
Destination of visit: Geneva
Dates of visit: 17 - 18 September 2017
Purpose of visit: To meet members of different countries’ missions to the UN Human Rights Council and representatives of the UN Commissioner for Human Rights to press for the implementation of UN HRC resolution 30/1.(Registered 19 October 2017)
